1. Common pharmacy school subjects (pharmacology, medicinal chemistry, pharmaceutics, clinical pharmacy)

4. Specialized study materials and resources needed

The report provides a comprehensive foundation for developing specialized pharmacy education tutoring programs that align with accreditation standards and address documented student needs.
